TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Control extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示使用 定義其外觀之使用者介面 (UI) 項目的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class for user interface (UI) elements that use a to define their appearance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是許多應用程式中加入控制項的基底類別。The class is the base class for many of the controls you add to an application. 類別會定義很少的行為; 雖然您可以新增應用程式時，會將控制項是繼承自更常見，例如或。The class defines very little behavior; while it is possible to add a to your application, it is far more common to add a control that inherits from , such as a or . 屬性，亦即，指定的外觀。The property, which is a , specifies the appearance of the . 如果您想要變更控制項的外觀，但保留它的功能，您應該考慮建立新而不是建立新的類別。If you want to change the appearance of a control but retain its functionality, you should consider creating a new instead of creating a new class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 如果您想要建立控制項以自訂行為，以及允許其他人以自訂其外觀時，您的控制項可以繼承自類別，並定義。If you want to create a control with custom behavior as well as allow others to customize its appearance, your control can inherit from the class and define a . 如果您想要擴充現有控制項的行為，您可以繼承自的類別，繼承自。If you want to extend the behavior of an existing control, you can inherit from a class that inherits from . A沒有不會顯示在您的應用程式，並設定下列屬性沒有任何作用，除非明確地加以參考：A that does not have a is not visible in your application, and setting the following properties has no effect unless the references them explicitly: - - - - - - - - - - 一個常見的方式來使用這些屬性是繫結中的項目屬性。A common way to use these properties is to bind an element in the to the property. 例如，如果您想要變更色彩的值根據控制項屬性，您可以繫結中項目的一些屬性至。For example, if you want your control to change color according to the value of the property, you can bind some property of an element in the to the . 使用[TemplateBinding 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)控制項上的屬性繫結中的項目。Use the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md) to bind properties on a control to an element in the . 覆寫的中繼資料屬性並將其預設值設定為`true`。 overrides the metadata of the property and sets its default to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)

summary.span: 呼叫以排列 物件內容，並調整大小。

span.span: Called to arrange and size the content of a object.
The size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的控制項排列方式排列只的第一個的視覺子系。The default control arrangement arranges only the first visual child. 未套用轉換。No transforms are applied.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ Background { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };
member this.Background : System.Windows.Media.Brush with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定描述控制項背景的筆刷。

span.span: Gets or sets a brush that describes the background of a control.

value.span: 用來填滿控制項背景的筆刷。

span.span: The brush that is used to fill the background of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性僅適用於控制項的靜止狀態。The property applies only to the resting state of a control. 控制項的狀態變更時，控制項的預設樣式會指定它的外觀。The default style of the control specifies its appearance when the state of the control changes. 比方說，如果您設定屬性上的，按鈕在它未按下或停用時，才有該值。For example, if you set the property on a , the button has that value only when it is not pressed or disabled. 如果您想要建立具有更進階的自訂背景的控制項，您必須定義控制項的樣式。If you want to create a control that has a more advanced customization of the background, you must define the control's style. 這個屬性只會影響的控制項的範本會使用屬性做為參數。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控制項，這個屬性會造成任何影響。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、 , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定控制項的背景屬性。The following example shows how to set the background property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#11)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#1)] 下列範例示範可讓觸發程序來變更按鈕的背景，按下時的範本。The following example shows a template that enables a trigger to change the background of a button when it is pressed. [!code-xaml[BackgroundProp_snip#ButtonTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BackgroundProp_snip/CS/page1.xaml#buttontemplate)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double FontSize { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.FontSize : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字型大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the font size.
The size of the text in the .
The default is .
The font size must be a positive number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會影響的控制項的範本會使用屬性做為參數。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控制項，這個屬性會造成任何影響。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字串表示值。A string representation of a value. 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，值`1`是可以接受的。For example, a value of `1` is acceptable. 相同屬性值部分中提及的範圍限制適用於此處。The same range restrictions that are mentioned in the Property Value section apply here. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*值，如先前所述也就是後面接著一個這些單位宣告字串： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as previously described that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt==(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **附註**在許多情況下，雙精度浮點數可能會設定為 「 自動 」，但不會呈現如果設定為 「 自動 」。**Note** In many cases a double may be set to "Auto," but a does not render if set to "Auto". ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定控制項的字型的大小屬性。The following example shows how to set the font size property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#14)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlProps#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了， ，並，您可以設定屬性設，這會自動縮放以填滿父項目的配置的空間的子項目。In addition to , , and , you can set the property to , which stretches the child element to fill the allocated space of the parent element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 對齊、 邊界和填補概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md)。For more information, see [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md). 這個屬性只會影響的控制項的範本會使用屬性做為參數。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控制項，這個屬性會造成任何影響。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定控制項的內容的水平對齊方式屬性。The following example shows how to set the horizontal content alignment property of a control. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDoubleClick As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按兩下或更多下滑鼠按鈕時。

span.span: Occurs when a mouse button is clicked two or more times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然此路由的事件似乎會遵循事件反昇路由項目樹狀結構，實際上是由每個引發沿著項目樹狀結構的直接路由的事件。Although this routed event seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each . 如果您設定屬性，以`true`中事件處理常式，後續路由事件會發生設為`false`。If you set the property to `true` in a event handler, subsequent events along the route will occur with set to `false`. 這是較高層級的事件的控制項的取用者想要在使用者按兩下控制項時收到通知，並處理應用程式中的事件。This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application. 應該使用的控制項作者想要處理滑鼠點按動作雙事件時等於兩個。Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the event when is equal to two. 這會導致狀態中的項目樹狀結構中的另一個項目會處理事件的情況適當地傳播。This will cause the state of to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event. 類別會定義和事件，但未對應的按一下事件。The class defines the and events, but not corresponding single-click events. 若要查看是否使用者按一下控制項一次，處理事件 （或其對應項目），並檢查是否屬性值為 1。To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the property value is 1. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何附加至事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to attach an event handler to the event. [!code-xaml[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#controlevents11)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows the event handler of the event. span.span: The old template.
The new template.

summary.span: 每當控制項的範本變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called whenever the control's template changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更範本的時間如下所示：The timing for changing the template is as follows: 1. 變更範本方法呼叫、 樣式觸發程序或一些其他方法。The template is changed by a method call, a style trigger, or some other means. 2. 變更屬性值;屬性變更時呼叫回呼。The property value changes; the property-changed callback is called. 3. 會移除舊的視覺化樹狀結構。The old visual tree is removed. 4. 內部的方法會呼叫它最後會呼叫方法。An internal method is called which eventually calls the method. 5. 稍後，在量值，呼叫並附加新的視覺化樹狀結構。Later, during a measure, is called and a new visual tree is attached.

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項範本。

span.span: Gets or sets a control template.
The template that defines the appearance of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的外觀; 如果沒有，則不會出現在您的應用程式。The specifies the appearance of a ; if a does not have a , the will not appear in your application. 控制項作者定義預設控制項範本，而且應用程式作者可以覆寫重新定義控制項的視覺化樹狀結構。The control author defines the default control template, and the application author can override the to redefine the visual tree of the control. 請參閱[控制項的樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)資訊和範例，示範如何變更現有控制項的視覺化樹狀結構。See [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md) for information and examples of how to change the visual tree of existing controls. A將不會察覺到外部使用者和物件，其中包括的實作詳細資料的自主的單位物件。A is intended to be a self-contained unit of implementation detail that is invisible to outside users and objects, including objects. 管理控制項範本的內容的唯一方式是從相同的控制項範本。The only way to manipulate the content of the control template is from within the same control template. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會建立針對。The following example creates a for a . 如果您的加入您的應用程式，做為資源，應用程式中的所有按鈕會顯示為 省略符號，但仍會為按鈕的函式。If you add this to your application as a resource, all the buttons in the application will appear as ellipses but will still function as buttons. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ButtonCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#buttonct)]
